div.ab: Remainder carried to Mesore 143 1/2 1/12 1/24 artabas. In Mesore we received nothing. In Thoth from Touphis 500 art., from which deduct 7 per cent for loss in cleansing, making 32 2/3 art., leaving 467 1/3 art. Of clean sesame by the 30-choinix measure, which makes with what was carried forward 6101/2 1/3 1/12 1/24 art. Of this there was manufactured in Mesore 88 art., in Thoth 188 art., total 276 art.; remainder carried to Phaophi 334 1/2 1/3 1/12 1/24 art., also 22 1/6 art. Of untested croton. In this a loss occurred through Damasippos of 5 1/6 1/24 art., remainder 329 1/2 1/4 art. of clean sesame. Fluid produce. Carried forward from the 29th year to Mecheir of the 30th year 83 metretai 10 choes of sesame oil. Sesame manufactured: Mecheir, 112 art. From which the yield was 38 metr. 6 ch.; Phamenoth, 120 art., yield of oil 41 metr. 3 ch. 6 kotylai; Pharmouthi, 56 art., oil 19 metr. 3 ch.; Pachon, no manufacture; Payni, manufactured 80 art., yield of oil 27 metr. 6 ch.; Epeiph, ï¿½ 3 ch. ...
